title: The OCE Server as a whole.
body: Yea so I have gone the past couple of days where I have reduced playing LoL due to the amount of toxicity and alleged trolls during champ select. Yes I might come across as a jackass complaining about the community, which lets face it, is trash to begin with. But I don't understand how there hasn't been some sort of tribunal system introduced into OCE to reduce the amount of "troll" accounts and to furthermore reduce OCE's overall toxicity. I have honestly played around 10+ games in the last week where I have had people go afk purely because some sulky mid doesn't ward, gets ganked then flames the jungler. There really needs to be something in place to counter this. It is abysmal to say the least. I get that Aussies are like the biggest cunts on the planet when it comes to talking shit but (no offence to NZ players for not referencing you, I'm just speaking what I know

replies.body:
***Tribunal is the the works for all servers, because it didn't work before***. Play norms and que with 4 of your friends that aren't toxic and have some fun. If you want to climb up ranks but can't handle solo que toxicity, join a ranked team or create your own. 

Yes, our server is toxic as ♥♥♥♥, but no so much as to exceed the toxicity of other servers.
your in denial mate the first step to changing the toxicity in this server is to admit that its the worst
I agree with this, based on the fact that I moved from NA before OCE was around (Season 3). NA does have its %%%%ters, but yea we have the worst server by far in regards to toxicity.

not sure about you guys, but i've been having a lot of great game lately

yes, people do argue once in a while, but there's always way to turn it around :)


the toxicity is controllable most of the time, i'd say 30% of the time people do argue in game, just try to help them to refocus in the game

Yea no, I do agree, I honestly think I am just going through a rough patch. Especially after the whole server maintenance thing, where games were experiencing dc's almost every game and where games were just not joinable. It most likely just frustrated the already aggravated players.

I have been watching from the OCE boards a rioter putting up a video about Riot Lyte's discussion about the tribunal system that is till in the making hence it will be on its way however it is not known when. 

My experience as a whole however from transferring to the american server to OCE the encounters that I have had from all of my games even from normal and aram are players arguing with each other. From my thoughts about League is that we as players are competitive about winning and its the "lets have fun with the game" that has deteriorated. But! don't give up your hope on the game my friend, those 10 games and make the judgement that "all" Australians are toxic. There are friendly players out there and it is always nice meeting them. :)
Interesting, I might have to go check it out to get some sort of idea in regards to the situation. But yea indeed there is good players out there that do just enjoy the game for what it is, a game.
lets face facts, if riot banned all the trolls, they would not have oce community to make money from, and this is why they wont do it

Yea, it really is why OCE is lacking in the way the community functions. Australian people are generally trolls to being with irl worse in game. It doesn't help that we don't have the numbers the bigger severs have to make it viable for us to actually have a harsh tribunal system. But I suppose there always is the mute button and the incredible amount of spare time I currently have to make up for losing LP.
